description: Operators that can generate large amounts of SP for other operators

SS.ptilopsis: Passive SP generation and not many requirements for it too

S.bagpipe: Boosts for vanguards, especially enabling fast flagbearer strategies
S.warfarin: Small SP battery when enemies in range are killed
S.saria: Small SP battery when giving heals

B.ch_en: Small auto sp battery for offensive/defensive recovery
